author: CMSTrackerDPG
body:
#### PR description:

Follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37665 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37619.
As `MonitorElement`s supporting an underlying `TH2I` histogram have been made available, change all the 2D correlation plots in `DQM/SiPixelPhase1Heterogeneous` to use them.
This PR is targeting a possible memory reduction for the GPU validation workflow.

### Some work is still needed on the legacy GUI to correctly display them, DO NOT MERGE before that's done 

#### PR validation:

See please https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37665#issuecomment-1112315939

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: [DO NOT MERGE] change all 2D correlation plots in `DQM/SiPixelPhase1Heterogeneous` to use `TH2I`
